title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: Regulations Tighten With New Bill And More
description: California Governor Gavin Newsom has approved the Digital Financial Assets Law, which will put in place a specific framework of operations for all individuals and businesses participating in activities involving digital assets.

title: Jeremy Hogan reveals turning point in Ripple case
description: In a decisive turn in the protracted legal saga between Ripple and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), all charges against Ripple’s executives have recently been dropped, signaling a shift in the case’s dynamics. title: Bitcoin Poised for a Bullish Trajectory After 2 Years: Analyst
description:
